name: Double Dee and Steinski
description:
'''Double Dee and Steinski''' is a duo of [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] producers, composed of '''Doug "Double Dee" DiFranco''' and '''Steven "Steinski" Stein'''. They achieved notoriety in the early 1980s for a series of [[Underground music|underground]] hip-hop [[sampling (music)|sample]]-based [[collages]] known as the "Lessons".

Although they never had a hit record, they proved highly influential for subsequent artists such as [[Coldcut]], [[DJ Shadow]], [[Cut Chemist]], [[the Avalanches]], and [[Girl Talk (musician)|Girl Talk]]. Their music was not widely available on CD until 2008 due to their [[Sampling (music)#Legal and ethical issues|use of copyrighted material]]. There have been occasional [[bootleg recording|illegal]] re-issues, and several internet sites have mp3s of their music available for download.
